pages.text: The Aquagust Crystal is an elemental type crystal, representing water. They can be used to throw water in their "Water Throw" mode, which can extinguish players or blocks, or damage a Blaze by 1.5 hearts, at the cost of 1% potential, 10% insanity, and 1 $(l:reagents/advanced_reagent)Advanced Reagent$(/l). Its counterpart is the $(l:crystals/hellfire_crystal)Hellfire Crystal$(/l).
